page.title: 20MACHINES IN OUR HOMES
page.content: We did a survey using the 14 families in Class 1 to see what machines we had in our homes.Every family had{T.V}and 11 families had two. Only 1 family had a{video.}5 families had{computers}and 1 family had two. 7 families had {'hi-fi'}equipment and 1 family had three.13 families had{electric cookers 1 used{Calor Gas,}4{used wood- burning {cookers.}3 families had two means of cooking. 4 families had{micro wave {ovens.}All the families had the{phone 3 had two telephones and 1 family had three.All the families had a{washer for clothes and 13 had a{deep freeze. Only 2 families had a{dish washer. {OUR NAMES}Andrew Morris,Joanne Marsh, Sally Smith,Karen & Trevor Troth,Lee Urbaniec.Ian Jackson,Andrew Yates, Jamie Macdonald,Christine Marsh,Sharon Rogerson,Joena & Richard Peuleve,Jamie Maclean,Allison Postans,Lance Appleby.
